Flow.description: This is the main flow that runs when the Contact is inserted or updated before save.

formulas.name: formOtherFormatE164
formulas.expression: if ( len( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.OtherPhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", "")) = 10, "+1" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.OtherPhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", ""), {!$Record.OtherPhone})

formulas.name: formTAltPhoneFormatE164
formulas.expression: if ( len( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Alt_Phone__c}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", "")) = 10, "+1" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Alt_Phone__c}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", ""), {!$Record.Alt_Phone__c})

formulas.name: formTHomeFormatE164
formulas.expression: if ( len( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.HomePhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", "")) = 10, "+1" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.HomePhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", ""), {!$Record.HomePhone})

formulas.name: formTMobileFormatE164
formulas.expression: if ( len( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.MobilePhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", "")) = 10, "+1" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.MobilePhone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", ""), {!$Record.MobilePhone})

formulas.description: Reformat of the phone to the E164 format.
formulas.name: formTPhoneFormatE164
formulas.expression: if ( len( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", "")) = 10, "+1" + SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.Phone}, "-", ""), " ", ""), "(", ""), ")", ""), "+", ""), ".", ""), {!$Record.Phone})

Flow.label: RecordTrigger:Contact Insert or Update Before Save

recordUpdates.description: This update will reformat phone fields to the E.164 format.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Phone_Fields_To_E_164_Format
recordUpdates.label: Update Phone Fields To E.164 Format
